content: annie s ghost *¨`* ☠ *¨`* ………… wishing you the skull iest day ever ☠ ✿ *☠`* ¯`v´¯ ☠ ¯`v´¯ *☠`* ✿ ✿ *☠`* ¸ ¯`v´¯ ¸ ´*☠`* ✿ ………… … ¸ ´ … ………… this pattern is © 2022 to ann wanamaker please do not sell copy or publish this pattern for resale this is a great little stash buster take your scrap threads and bring them out for this one you know you are like me and have a bag of odds and ends of them in all colors size 10 thread and a 1 75 mm hook stitch guide - sts st- stitches stitch - chain chain stitch - slip_stitch slip_stitch - single_crochet single_crochet - half_double_crochet half_double_crochet - double_crochet --double_crochet - treble_crochet -triple crochet - -2dc or 3dc-decrease - yarn over insert the hook into the next stitch yarn over draw the yarn through the stitch yarn over draw the yarn through 2 loops on the hook repeat however many times noted yarn over draw the yarn through the remaining loops on the hook - - 2dctog two double_crochet together -yarn over insert the hook into the next stitch yarn over draw the yarn through the stitch yarn over draw the yarn through 2 loops on the hook yarn over insert hook in same space yarn over draw the yarn through the 2 loops yarn over draw the yarn through the 3 remaining loops on the hook - alternative picot- ch3 single_crochet in top of last st made 2 round 1 ch4 15 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook join with a slip_stitch in top of beg chain 16 double_crochet you can make a magic_ring and put 16 double_crochet in it as well round 2 ch3 double_crochet in same space 2dc in each of next 4sts 2trc in next st ch3 single_crochet in top of last treble_crochet made 2trc in next st 2dc in each of next 9sts join with a slip_stitch in top of beg ch3 ch9 4trc 1-alternative picot 25dc beg chain ch9 going from rounds to row row 3 half_double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook half_double_crochet in each of next 4 chs double_crochet in each of next 2 chs flip head to wrong side double_crochet in same st as turning this is where you started your ch9 from at end of round 2 ch1 skip next 3 sts 8dc in next st ch3 this will end up being a ch1 space and a double_crochet skip next 3 sts one st may be hidden because of the 8dc in prev st slip_stitch into next st ch9 half_double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook half_double_crochet in each of next 4 chs double_crochet in each of next 2 chs flip head to right side slip_stitch in 2nd chain of the ch3 row 4 ch2 double_crochet in same space ch2 skip ch1 space double_crochet-decrease over next 2 sts 2dctog in each of next 4 sts double_crochet- decrease over next 2 sts ch2 skip chain space 2dctog in next st
